description:
Introduction to Keywords is all about finding thousands of keywords to drive traffic to your website. Are you a small business owner who wants to increase traffic to your website? Starting an online shop, writing a blog, or or creating an online service that you want to be easily found on Google? This is the course for you!

This course has 14 lessons that will guide you through many different methods and provide you with several tools to identify specific and targeted keywords for your website to grow your business or drive traffic.

Lesson topics include:

  • Types of Keywords
  • Where to Find Keywords
  • The Alphabet Test
  • Website Analytic Software
  • Findability and Engagement
  • Geo Targetted Keywords
In addition, when going through this course you will also receive the course content and a very thorough assignment to go along with each lesson to assist you in generating every conceivable keyword and drive traffic to your website!
title: Introduction to Keywords
